title: Swedish Flag
description: Make the Swedish Flag with code

steps.hint: Let’s get moving. Start the flag off by typing `background blue`.
The Swedish flag has big yellow bars so set the stroke with `stroke 100, yellow`.
We've always drawn from the middle of the canvas, but we can move around by **typing** `moveTo 150, 0`.
Let’s move again, this time to the left. **Type** `moveTo 0, 250`.

completion_text: See how the small crosshair has moved to the left? If you move your mouse over the canvas you can see how the x and y values change. This can help figure out where you are on the canvas.
